title: Trump’s 25% Tariffs On Canada, Mexico Take Effect
description: President Donald Trump’s 25% taxes on imports from Mexico and Canada went into effect today, the latest salvo in a North American trade war that may have already stoked inflation and impeded growth. What do you think? The post Trump’s 25% Tariffs On Canada, Mexico Take Effect appeared first on The Onion.
author: The Onion Staff
excerpt: President Donald Trump’s 25% taxes on imports from Mexico and Canada went into effect today, the latest salvo in a North American trade war that may have already stoked inflation and impeded growth. What do you think?
text: President Donald Trump’s 25% taxes on imports from Mexico and Canada went into effect today, the latest salvo in a North American trade war that may have already stoked inflation and impeded growth. What do you think? “It won’t affect me, because my wife does all our grocery shopping.” Dustin Schroat, Pronoun Expert “My household’s tamarind budget is large enough as it is.” Marlene Oberman, Lettuce Grower “This wasn’t what I voted for. What I voted for was much, much worse.” Todd Yanovsky, Soap Scenter Like A Vitamin You Ingest With Your Eyes. Get The Onion Newsletter. html:
President Donald Trump’s 25% taxes on imports from Mexico and Canada went into effect today, the latest salvo in a North American trade war that may have already stoked inflation and impeded growth. What do you think?

“It won’t affect me, because my wife does all our grocery shopping.”

Dustin Schroat, Pronoun Expert

“My household’s tamarind budget is large enough as it is.”

Marlene Oberman, Lettuce Grower

“This wasn’t what I voted for. What I voted for was much, much worse.”

Todd Yanovsky, Soap Scenter
